00065    char * RunID;

00067 
00068    while (EOF != (opt = getopt(argc, argv, "f:hx?"))) {
00069       switch (opt) {
00070       case 'x':
00071          Example(argv);
00072          break;

00074          RunID = optarg;
00075          break;

00077       case '?':
00078       case '*':
